Message:
200 years have passed since then.
The life my master gave me has
kept my body from aging a day.

The dead cannot come back to life.
Resenting such a fact after
all this time is pointless.

So, instead,
I journeyed across the world.

I attained vast knowledge,
all to bring my master’s dream
to fruition.

Now, the flowers he adored
so much are admired by
people all over the world.

If you asked me if I feel
grief at his absence, I do.
But, I am not lonely.

When the flowers bloom in spring,
I can still feel traces of Master.

Whenever I close my eyes,
I can see that gentle smile of his
as clearly as ever.

Even if he is no longer
by my side, I can still keep
a piece of him with me.
